history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lub_Rbar_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lub_Rbar_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_disk,is_lub_Rbar_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_disk,Rabs_pos,is_lub_Rbar_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_disk,Rabs_pos,is_lub_Rbar_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_disk,Rabs_pos,is_lub_Rbar_unique.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat x : K H : ex_pseries a x Unable to unify "Lub_Rbar ?M2363 = ?M2364" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (PS_incr_n a n k)) l".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference l was not found in the current environment.
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. apply is_lub_Rbar_unique. split. - intros x H4. unfold CV_disk in H4. destruct (Rle_dec (/ l) (Rabs x)). ++ apply Rabs_pos in H4. simpl in H4. now right. ++ apply Rabs_def2 in H4. symmetry in H2. apply Rlt_le in H2. apply ex_series_DAlembert with (a := a) (p := l) (Ap := fun n : nat => Rabs (a n)) (k := / Rabs x); auto; intros. now replace (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * ((1 / Rabs x) ^ n))) with (fun n : nat => (1/Rabs x) ^ n * Rabs (a n)) by easy. - replace (/ l) with (Rabs (/ l)) by (rewrite Rabs_Rinv; eauto with real). intros x H4. eapply Rlt_le_trans. apply H4.
